Extracted Data.Name: Veerasami S
Extracted Data.Summary or Objective: Data Analyst with 4 years and 6 months of experience in data analysis and business analytics. Skilled in Power BI, Power Apps Development, and Power Automate, with a strong background in business analytics, forecasting, and data mining. Proficient in developing dynamic dashboards and reports that provide actionable insights and drive business impact. Experienced in leveraging data driven strategies to support decision making and effectively communicate insights across teams.

Experience.Title: Junior Business Analyst
Experience.Description: Collaborated with stakeholders to identify business needs and translated them into clear requirements. Analyzed business processes and identify areas for improvement. Conduct gap analysis to assess inefficiencies and recommend solutions. Work closely with stakeholders to gather and define business requirements. Translate business needs into functional and technical requirements. Analyze large datasets to provide business insights. Identify potential business risks and recommend mitigation strategies.

Experience.Title: Senior MIS Executive
Experience.Description: Experienced in developing custom business solutions using Microsoft Power Apps, including canvas and model driven apps. Skilled in streamlining workflows and enhancing user experience through data integration and automation. Designed interactive dashboards and reports using Power BI to visualize complex data sets, enabling data driven decision making. Automated repetitive tasks and workflows using Power Automate, reducing manual effort and increasing operational efficiency. Managed SharePoint sites, including user permissions, content organization, and site customization, ensuring optimal usability and security. Developed custom forms and reports in MS Access to facilitate data entry, analysis, and reporting, tailored to specific business needs and user requirements.

Experience.Title: MIS Executive
Experience.Company: Sumeet Urban Services PVT. LTD, Chennai
Experience.Description: Designed, monitored, analyzed, and troubleshot IT Systems. Produced and analyzed KPI reports & dashboards. Support the automation team. Published MIS reports. Coordinate with the team to collect and verify data accurately. Manage and update hourly reports to ensure accurate and real time data tracking.

Certifications: Data Visualization with Power BI (Great Learning)
Extracted Data.Education: Bachelor of Arts (English Literature), Ramakrishna Mission Vivekananda College, Chennai (2020)

Recommendations: Since the resume is **2 pages** long, condense the content to fit onto a single page for better readability and impact. Consider focusing on the most relevant and recent experiences and skills to achieve this.
While the resume includes certifications, consider adding more industry recognized certifications relevant to **data analysis** or **business intelligence** to showcase expertise.

Although you have listed your skills, try quantifying your achievements and show the impact you had in your previous roles. Use metrics to demonstrate your accomplishments and highlight the value you brought to the organizations, such as **'Reduced reporting time by 30%'**.

Include specific projects you have worked on, detailing your role, the technologies used, and the outcomes achieved. This provides a more concrete demonstration of your abilities than just listing skills. Focus on highlighting projects that showcase your skills in **data analysis, dashboard development, or automation**.
The **'Summary'** is well written and explains all the skills. But try to be more concise

Consider using a professional resume template with clear sections and formatting to improve readability and visual appeal. A well-structured template can help ensure that your resume is easy to scan and highlights your most relevant qualifications.

RESUME_TIPS: In your summary, highlight experience with **demand forecasting** to directly align with the job's focus; mention any specific forecasting methodologies or tools used to improve accuracy. Include metrics to show how your forecasting impacted inventory management.

Expand on your experience with inventory management by describing how you have performed **inventory optimization** to reduce costs or increase efficiency. Quantify the impact of these optimizations, such as reducing **overstock** by a certain percentage, under your experience in Careernet Technologies.

Include examples of how you’ve managed **replenishment** processes across different channels. Detail your experience in coordinating with warehouses to optimize **stock** levels, especially in scenarios involving multiple retail locations under your roles at Livspace or Careernet.

Demonstrate proficiency with **ERP systems** by including any experience you have with systems like **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce**. Mention how you used these systems to streamline inventory processes, specifically highlighting your data management skills using **SQL** or similar tools.

Incorporate specific examples of how you’ve used **Power BI** to create dashboards for inventory health. Detail the types of metrics you monitored, such as **inventory turnover ratio** or **store fill rate**, and how these metrics drove decision-making.

Add details about your experience with **ABC classification** and **EOQ** methodologies in your skills or under your experience at Careernet. Explain how you used these techniques to improve inventory control and reduce waste.

Include any experience in setting **min/max levels** for inventory across different stores and channels. Give quantifiable results, e.g., 'Improved **store fill rate** by X% by optimizing **min/max levels**'.

Discuss your familiarity with managing inventory for new product launches, focusing on how you balanced inventory across different stores and online channels. This should align with the job's emphasis on **omnichannel inventory** management.
Elaborate on your experience in managing **stock** for **FOFO franchise models**. Specify your role in inventory allocation and how you ensured optimal **stock** levels across franchise locations.

Highlight any experience in fashion retail, FMCG, or D2C brands, as mentioned in the job description; if applicable, demonstrate your understanding of specific challenges and strategies within these industries and mention in your introduction.

Demand Forecasting.DESCRIPTION: Comprehensive course on forecasting techniques and integrating demand management with overall supply chain strategy.
Learn to use statistical methods and software tools for accurate business forecasting and decision-making.
A free video series covering the basics of time series analysis and forecasting techniques using statistical models.

Inventory Optimization.DESCRIPTION: Learn techniques for managing inventory levels, reducing costs, and improving efficiency in supply chain operations.
Understand how to use data analytics to optimize supply chain processes, including inventory control and distribution.
A series of videos explaining inventory control techniques and strategies for small businesses.

Replenishment.DESCRIPTION: Master the replenishment process in retail, from demand forecasting to distribution, optimizing stock levels and minimizing costs.
Learn advanced planning techniques for supply chain management, focusing on optimizing replenishment and distribution strategies.
Compilation of videos explaining various inventory replenishment methods such as continuous review and periodic review systems.

ERP systems.DESCRIPTION: Gain a solid understanding of ERP systems and how they integrate various business functions.
Learn about the principles and applications of ERP systems in business management.
A collection of introductory videos explaining the basics and benefits of ERP systems.

NetSuite.DESCRIPTION: Learn the basics of NetSuite and how to navigate its core modules, including accounting and CRM.
Understand the steps involved in implementing NetSuite for a business, from planning to go-live.
A collection of tutorials covering various aspects of NetSuite, from basic navigation to advanced customization.

Zoho.DESCRIPTION: Master Zoho CRM and its features, from lead management to sales automation, enhancing customer relationship management.
Get certified in Zoho products and learn how to use them effectively in your business workflows.
A series of videos providing step-by-step instructions on using Zoho applications for business management.

Unicommerce.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to manage e-commerce operations effectively, including order processing, inventory management, and fulfillment using platforms like Unicommerce.
Understand the fundamental concepts of supply chain and logistics management and how platforms like Unicommerce fit into the overall process.
Official training videos and tutorials provided by Unicommerce for its users.
